name: Abacus
description: Abacus is an online portal for teachers to manage their assignments, students, and grades, all in one virtual location.

name: BookNook
description: BookNook allows you to enter movies you enjoy, and based upon your entry, suggests a book for you to read.

name: Batman Villain Database
description: Using ReactJS, the Villain Database lets the user sort and search through Batman's best known villains.

name: Krabby Burger
description: Using online databasing, create your own Krabby Patty and eat it!

name: Weather App
description: Utilizing local storage, The Weather App allows you to look up local five day forecasts anywhere across the globe.

name: Workday Scheduler
description: Focusing on the use of JavaScript, and scope, the Workday Scheduler allows the user to track their daily tasks.
